item.title: How to skip those pesky Youtube adverts on your android phone.
item.description: I will be upfront about my skills to be frugal. I do not want to spend any money just to watch Youtube without interruptions and advertisements. As it happens, by the end of last year, I was so fedup with the adverts that I was almost about to subscribe. But the frugal person in me said to stop and see if there’s a (free) way around it. I use an automation app called “Automatic Premium” on my mobile that automates few of the frequent chores in my life.
